00011 //default settings for all cameras
00012 //use settings which most cameras supports !!!
00013 const int kDefaultImageWidth = 640;
00014 const int kDefaultImageHeight = 480;
00015 const camera::frame_mode_t kDefaultImageMode = camera::MODE_RGB;
00016 const int kDefaultColorDepth = 3;                       // in bytes per pixel
00017 
00018 namespace camera

00020     CamInterface::CamInterface()
00021     {
00022         image_size_ = frame_size_t(kDefaultImageWidth,kDefaultImageHeight);
00023         image_mode_ = kDefaultImageMode;
00024         image_color_depth_ = kDefaultColorDepth;
00025         act_grab_mode_ = Stop;
00026     }

00033     bool CamInterface::setFrameSettings(  const frame_size_t size,
00034                                           const frame_mode_t mode,
00035                                           const uint8_t color_depth,
00036                                           const bool resize_frames)
00037     {

00045     bool CamInterface::setFrameSettings(const Frame &frame,
00046                                         const bool resize_frames)
00047     {
00048         return setFrameSettings(frame.size,frame.frame_mode,
00049                                 frame.getPixelSize(),resize_frames);

00052     bool CamInterface::findCamera
00053                         (const CamInfo &pattern,CamInfo &cam )const
00054      {
00055         std::vector<CamInfo> list;
00056         listCameras(list);
00057 
00058         for(int i=0; i< list.size();++i)
00059         {
00060             if (list[i].matches(pattern))
00061             {
00062                 cam = list[i];
00063                 return true;
00064             }
00065         }
00066         return false;
00067     }
00068 
00069      bool CamInterface::open2(const CamInfo &pattern,const AccessMode mode)
00070      {
00071         CamInfo info;
00072         if(findCamera(pattern,info))
00073             return open(info,mode);
00074         else
00075              throw std::runtime_error("Can not find camera!");
00076         return false;
00077      }
00078 
00079     bool CamInterface::open2(const std::string &display_name,
00080                              const AccessMode mode)
00081     {
00082         CamInfo info;
00083         info.display_name = display_name;
00084         if(findCamera(info,info))
00085             return open(info,mode);
00086         else
00087              throw std::runtime_error("Can not find camera!");
00088         return false;
00089     }
00090 
00091     int CamInterface::countCameras()const
00092     {
00093         std::vector<CamInfo> cam_infos;
00094         return listCameras(cam_infos);
00095     }

00097     CamInterface& CamInterface::operator>>(Frame &frame)
00098     {
00099         if(act_grab_mode_ == Stop)
00100             grab(SingleFrame,1);
00101         retrieveFrame(frame);
00102     }

00104     bool CamInterface::setFrameToCameraFrameSettings(Frame &frame)
00105     {
00106         if(!isOpen())
00107           throw std::runtime_error("No Camer is open!");
00108         frame_size_t size;
00109         frame_mode_t mode;
00110         uint8_t depth;
00111         getFrameSettings(size,mode,depth);
00112         frame.init(size.width,size.height,depth,mode);
00113         return true;
00114     }
